scripts.build: npm run build:tsoa && npm run build:docs && npm run build:client
scripts.dev:startdb: docker start pg-dabih || docker run -d --name pg-dabih -p 5432:5432 -v "./data/postgres:/var/lib/postgresql/data"  --env-file .env.dev postgres:16-alpine
scripts.dev:stopdb: docker stop pg-dabih && docker rm pg-dabih
scripts.dev:startredis: docker start redis-dabih || docker run -d --name redis-dabih -p 6379:6379 redis:alpine
scripts.dev:stopredis: docker stop redis-dabih && docker rm redis-dabih
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run dev:startdb && npm run dev:startredis && npm run dev:start
scripts.test:stopdb: docker stop pg-dabih-test && docker rm pg-dabih-test
scripts.test:startredis: docker start redis-dabih-test || docker run -d --name redis-dabih-test -p 6380:6379 redis:alpine
scripts.test:stopredis: docker stop redis-dabih-test && docker rm redis-dabih-test
scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:startdb && sleep 2 && npm run test:startredis && npm run test:prepare && npm run test:api ; npm run test:stopdb && npm run test:stopredis
